The Governments of all developing Countries are looking for National ID Projects, and Citizen Verification projects through biometrics. Even Banking & Telcos companies are using biometric technology to carry out e-KYC for customer onboarding and verification processes. How Mantra Can Help? Mantra is one of the leading Biometrics, Access Control & RFID provider in India. Mantra leverages the next-generation technologies like Biometrics, RFID, and Artificial Intelligence to develop advanced Access Control Solutions, support National ID, eKYC, and Individual Verification Projects. With groundbreaking innovations and cutting-edge techniques, Mantra can help to meet the new and evolving security demands of today and tomorrow through secure identity management and authentication services. Why Mantra Can Help? Mantra has more than a decade of experience in developing and implementing the national ID project "Aadhaar," access control projects, and an identity-based food distribution project. Mantra has also worked with the top banking & financial institutions and corporates in India. Through our innovative and collaborative approach, we offer simple, scalable and future-oriented biometric identification solutions to the large scale government welfare programs. Read More Aadhaar Products Mantra is the leading STQC certified manufacturer of Biometric products for Aadhaar project in India.
